title: From Postgres to video
metaDescription: Turn Postgres query results into deterministic, branded MP4 videos using a simple API.

hero.headline: From Postgres to video
hero.subheadline: Query your database, send JSON, and receive a branded MP4 video.

problem.title: Query results aren't shareable on their own
bullets: SQL outputs live in dashboards, not customer workflows.
Stakeholders skim spreadsheets and miss context.
Manual report creation wastes engineering cycles.
Video summaries increase engagement and clarity.

solution.title: Convert query results into video
bullets: Run your Postgres query on a schedule or trigger.
POST the results to /render with a template id.
Rendivia renders a deterministic MP4 asynchronously.
Deliver the video through your product or email.

outputBullets: Brand logo, colors, and typography applied
Webhook includes output URL and metadata

steps.title: Query Postgres
steps.body: Run a scheduled or triggered query.

steps.title: Send JSON
steps.body: POST results to /render with your API key.

steps.title: Render async
steps.body: We queue and render reliably at scale.

steps.title: Deliver
steps.body: Receive a webhook and deliver the MP4.

benefits.title: Benefits
bullets: Turn raw data into a narrative
Share results in a format people consume

faq.q: Can I use any SQL query?
faq.a: Yes. Send the results as JSON to the render API.
Yes. Same inputs produce the same output on a fixed template version.
